<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_cb_node</collection> <condition>current.getRecordClassName() == 'sys_cb_decision' || current.getRecordClassName() == 'sys_cb_outcome' || current.getRecordClassName() == 'sys_cb_collector'</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Can node be deleted</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var OUTCOME_MESSAGE = gs.getMessage("There are conversation paths that would be orphaned if this Decision Outcome record is deleted. Please delete those conversation paths before deleting this Decision Outcome"); var DECISION_MESSAGE = gs.getMessage("There are conversation paths that would be orphaned if this Decision record is deleted. Please delete those conversation paths before deleting this Decision"); var COLLECTOR_MESSAGE = gs.getMessage("There are conversation paths that would be orphaned if this Thread Colletor record is deleted. Please delete those conversation paths before deleting this Thread Colletor."); var DEFAULT_MESSAGE = gs.getMessage("There are conversation paths that would be orphaned if this record is deleted. Please delete those conversation paths before deleting this Thread Colletor.");
var nodeUtil = new ConversationNodeUtil(); if (!nodeUtil.canNodeBeDeleted(current)) { current.setAbortAction(true); gs.debug("Aborting delete of node {0} ({1})", current.getValue("name"), current.getValue("sys_id"));
switch (current.getRecordClassName()) { case "sys_cb_decision": gs.addInfoMessage(DECISION_MESSAGE); break; case "sys_cb_outcome": gs.addInfoMessage(OUTCOME_MESSAGE); break; case "sys_cb_collector": gs.addInfoMessage(COLLECTOR_MESSAGE); break; default : gs.addInfoMessage(DEFAULT_MESSAGE); } return; } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-14 03:26:28</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>05ff73f7b3333200f7d1a13816a8dcdb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Can node be deleted</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">ad7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f75</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_05ff73f7b3333200f7d1a13816a8dcdb</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-08-11 00:36:09</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=05ff73f7b3333200f7d1a13816a8dcdb"/> </record_update>
